MvpLceView<M> - Interface in com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp.lce
A MvpView that assumes that there are 3 display operation: MvpLceView.showLoading(boolean): Display a loading animation while loading data in background by invoking the corresponding presenter method MvpLceView.showError(Throwable, boolean): Display a error view (a TextView) on the screen if an error has occurred while loading data.
